data.feedback: Architecture is well-designed following Clean Architecture + BLoC. Stories cover all auth requirements with proper dependencies. Minor metadata inconsistencies at epic level don't impact implementation.
issues: Epic filesToModify lists files that should be in filesToCreate (injection_container.dart, app_router.dart, routes.dart, auth_interceptor.dart)
Backend path in filesToRead doesn't exist in workspace - developers should reference API contract from story description instead
suggestions: Move lib/core/di/injection_container.dart, lib/core/router/app_router.dart, lib/core/router/routes.dart, lib/core/network/auth_interceptor.dart from filesToModify to filesToCreate at epic level
Remove project-app-pasos-backend reference from filesToRead since it's not in this workspace
Consider splitting Story 3 into separate infrastructure stories in future epics
